resources.string: Welcome to Med-Fleet \n\n Please rank the severity of your emergency (1 = Mild, 5 = Severe). You will select your location on the next screen.
We have successfully received your request. Your Med-Fleet kit should be arriving shortly.
There was a problem receiving your request. Please resubmit.
You are requesting that we dispatch a drone carrying a Med kit to the location you provided. Please confirm or deny this request below:
